  specialized the act or process of broadcasting or sending out something by radio or television, on the internet, etc. again or to another person or group: The legislation prohibits retransmission, interception, and related activities. In the case of a permanently broken link, the number of retransmissions is limited. The broadcast TV networks are demanding retransmission fees from the cable companies. Related word
